page.title: 13TRANSPORT-SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: When they finish the M25 it will lead much of the traffic off our narrow high street. We have seen some of the work going on when we were out doing our environmental study. We saw large cranes and bulldozers and deep holes in the ground for concrete pillars to support flyovers. Many people protested against the motorway being built but the people of Eynsford recognised the benefits it would bring and organised a march along the High Street. Demonstrators carried banners saying "Lives before lorries", "Save lives build M25". We will be glad when it is built and our road is safer. People will be able to get to the North of London and other places much more quickley and our village will be safer and more peacefull.
